Name: Riot At World
About the game: The world is under occupation because of humans tried to colonized mars and only one city left and unfortunetly it is colonized by aliens. The last humans of world are trying to get their independence from aliens. Riot At World is a fps multiplayer game based on human and alien war. The game offers players to have a low poly combat experience. There are human and alien tech weapons that can only be purchased with the game's own money. The game only has the multiplayer mode, but it will be for the solo mode too when the bot system is added. You can have a quick enjoy by playing this with your friends. The multiplayer mode is based on a 3-minute deathmatch so you can easily play and switch to another match.
